fullplot: This Civil War saga addresses romance, friendship, and the ravages of war--both in the field and on the home front. Captures the horrors of war for both those fighting it, and for those left behind. This is a tale of hope, longing, redemption, second chances, and faith.
plot: In the waning days of the American Civil War, a wounded soldier embarks on a perilous journey back home to Cold Mountain, North Carolina to reunite with his sweetheart.
title: Cold Mountain

tomatoes.consensus: The well-crafted Cold Mountain has an epic sweep and captures the horror and brutal hardship of war.
